Brickmason.about:
#030303 is an assembly of tones, sounds, and loops set to thoughtfully arranged colors. Tracks 1-20.
The houses are haunted
By white night-gowns.
None are green,
Or purple with green rings,
Or green with yellow rings,
Or yellow with blue rings.
None of them are strange,
With socks of lace
And beaded ceintures.
People are not going
To dream of baboons and periwinkles.
Only, here and there, an old sailor,
Drunk and asleep in his boots,
Catches tigers
In red weather.
////
#000055 is an assembly of tones, sounds, and loops set to thoughtfully arranged colors. Tracks 21-40.
Which is real—
This bottle of indigo glass in the grass,
Or the bench with the pot of geraniums, the stained mattress and the washed overalls drying in the sun?
Which of these truly contains the world?
Neither one, nor the two together.
credits
Brickmason.credits:
released December 31, 2022
#030303 released December 31, 2022
#000055 released November 1, 2023

Brickmason.title: #D2042D / #969C9D
Brickmason.about:
#D2042D is an assembly of tones, sounds, and loops set to thoughtfully arranged colors. Tracks 1-20.
Say that it is a crude effect, black reds,
Pink yellows, orange whites, too much as they are
To be anything else in the sunlight of the room,
Too much as they are to be changed by metaphor,
Too actual, things that in being real
Make any imaginings of them lesser things.
And yet this effect is a consequence of the way
We feel and, therefore, is not real, except
In our sense of it, our sense of the fertilest red,
Of yellow as first color and of white,
In which the sense lies still, as a man lies,
Enormous, in a completing of his truth.
Our sense of these things changes and they change,
Not as in metaphor, but in our sense
Of them. So sense exceeds all metaphor.
It exceeds the heavy changes of the light.
It is like a flow of meanings with no speech
And of as many meanings as of men.
We are two that use these roses as we are,
In seeing them. This is what makes them seem
So far beyond the rhetorician’s touch.
////
#969C9D is an assembly of tones, sounds, and loops set to thoughtfully arranged colors. Tracks 21-40.
In the moonlight
I met Berserk,
In the moonlight
On the bushy plain.
Oh, sharp he was
As the sleepless!
And, “Why are you red
In this milky blue?”
I said.
“Why sun-colored,
As if awake
In the midst of sleep?”
“You that wander,”
So he said,
“On the bushy plain,
Forget so soon.
But I set my traps
In the midst of dreams.”
I knew from this
That the blue ground
Was full of blocks
And blocking steel.
I knew the dread
Of the bushy plain,
And the beauty
Of the moonlight
Falling there,
Falling
As sleep falls
In the innocent air.
Brickmason.credits: released September 1, 2025

Brickmason.title: Liquid Mall
Brickmason.about:
I’ve always loved how mallsoft communicates a time and a place so well. Marley Station Mall was my mall. It was the first place I ever held a girl’s hand, where I’d go to Borders to read Kare Kano while laying down in the aisle, where I bought gifts for my friends around the holidays, where my friends and I would go to Suncoast to hang out, where I bought games at GameStop, where I learned how to buy clothes and how to shop, where I went with my grandmother to play at the inside play place when she was still alive. It’s where I’d go to sit in the massage chairs with my best friend and just talk.
Mallsoft brings me back there, and I hope it can bring you back there, too. It’s nostalgia, but it’s melancholic nostalgia.
Malls feel safe, crowded, full of people that are all around you but aren't necessarily paying attention to you, and that's kind of nice to feel alone in crowded spaces instead of feeling alone by yourself in your room.
I hope kids of future generations get to experience that feeling. I grew up as an online gamer on Runescape and Legends of Kronia and Diablo 2 and all kinds of text-based online games of the early internet, but there's something special about a mall and my time there as a kid.
Brickmason.credits: released December 4, 2024

Brickmason.title: night skies 夜空
Brickmason.about:
pink lanterns in spring 朝
By the time we reached the house, the sun was sinking and the day had become a soft spring evening.
For some strange reason, lying in this room seemed to bring back old memories that I had rarely if ever recalled before. Some of them were pleasant, but others carried a trace of sadness. How long did this go on? I was so immersed in that torrent of memory (and it was a torrent, like a spring gushing out of the rocks) that I failed to notice her quietly open the door and come in. I opened my eyes, and there she was. I raised my head and looked into her eyes for a time. She was sitting on the arm of the sofa, looking at me. At first I thought she might be an image spun into existence by my own memories. But it was the real her.
"Sleeping?" she whispered.
"No," I said, "just thinking."
She sat down and leaned against me on the sofa. When I put my arm around her, she rested her head on my shoulder and pressed her face to my neck. She stayed like that for a time, almost as if she were taking my temperature.
“April and May were painful, lonely months for me because I couldn't talk to you. I never knew that spring could be so painful and lonely. Better to have three Februaries than a spring like this.”
Holding her, I felt warm in the chest. After a short while, she stood up without saying a word and went out through the door as quietly as she had come in.
~~
blue lanterns in winter 夢
"It's not that I think there's anything wrong with this place," I said. "It's quiet, and the surroundings are perfect. But it's not a place to stay for a long time. It's too specialized for a long stay. The longer you're here, I'm sure, the harder it is to leave."
Instead of answering, she turned her gaze to the outside. Beyond the window, there was nothing to see but snow. Snow clouds hung low and heavy in the sky, with only the smallest gap between them and the snow-covered earth.
"Take your time, think it over," I said. "Whatever happens, I'm going to move by the end of March. Any time you decide you want to join me, you can come."
She nodded. I wrapped my arms around her as carefully as if I had been holding a work of art delicately fashioned from glass. She put her arms around my neck.
Every now and then, the snow would fall for a while and stop. The sky never cleared the whole three days I was there.
"I think I can get back here in March," I said as I was leaving.
I gave her one last, heavily padded hug with my winter coat on, and kissed her on the lips.
"Goodbye," she said.
Brickmason.credits:
released December 22, 2023
Released on cassette by Underwater Computing:
underwater-computing.bandcamp.com/album/night-skies

Brickmason.title: night skies again ま​た​夜​空
Brickmason.about:
purple lanterns in autumn 秋
The autumn light filtering through the branches danced over the shoulders of her jacket. She walked on without speaking. A dog barked again, closer than before. She climbed a small mound, walked out of the forest and hurried down a gentle slope. I followed two or three steps behind.
"Come over here," I called towards her back. "The well might be around here somewhere."
She stopped and smiled and took my arm. We walked the rest of the way side by side.
"Do you really promise never to forget me?" she asked in a near whisper.
"I'll never forget you," I said. "I could never forget you."
~
She looked into my eyes, and I into hers. I put my arm around her and kissed her. The slightest twinge went through her shoulders, and then she relaxed and closed her eyes for several seconds. The early autumn sun cast the shadow of her lashes on her cheek, and I could see it trembling in outline. It was a soft and gentle kiss, one not meant to lead beyond itself. I would probably not have kissed her that day if we hadn't spent the afternoon on the laundry deck in the sun, drinking beer and watching a fire, and she no doubt felt the same. After a long time of watching the glittering rooftops and the smoke and the red dragonflies, we had felt something warm and close, and we both probably wanted, half-consciously, to preserve that mood in some form. It was that kind of kiss.
~
It was still raining the following morning - a fine, almost invisible autumn rain unlike the previous night's downpour. You knew it was raining only because of the ripples on puddles and the sound of dripping from the eaves. I woke to see a milky white mist enclosing the window, but as the sun rose a breeze carried the mist away, and the surrounding woods and hills began to emerge.
"Beautiful day out there," I said, perching on the stool and crossing my legs. "It's autumn, Sunday, great weather, and crowded everywhere you go. Relaxing indoors like this is the best thing you can do on such a nice day. It's exhausting in those crowds.”
~
“You went back to Tokyo just about the time the autumn weather was deepening, so for a time I couldn't tell whether the hole that opened up inside me was from missing you or from the change of the season. We talk about you all the time. Reiko says be sure to say ‘Hi’ to you. She is as nice to me as ever. I don't think I would have been able to stand this place if I didn't have her with me. I cry when I'm lonely. She says it's good I can cry. But feeling lonely really hurts. When I'm lonely at night, people talk to me from the darkness. They talk to me the way trees moan in the wind at night. Kizuki; my sister: they talk to me like that all the time. They're lonely, too, and looking for someone to talk to. I often reread your letters at night when I'm lonely and in pain. I get confused by a lot of things that come from outside, but your descriptions of the world around you give me wonderful relief. It's so strange! I wonder why that should be?”
~~
white lanterns in summer 夏
The firefly made a faint glow in the bottom of the jar, its light all too weak, its color all too pale. I hadn't seen a firefly in years, but the ones in my memory sent a far more intense light into the summer darkness, and that brilliant, burning image was the one that had stayed with me all that time. Maybe this firefly was on the verge of death.
I gave the jar a few shakes. The firefly bumped against the glass walls and tried to fly, but its light remained dim. I tried to remember when I had last seen fireflies, and where it might have been. I could see the scene in my mind, but was unable to recall the time or place. A light breeze swept past me, leaving strangely brilliant trails in the dark. I opened my eyes to find the darkness of the summer night a few degrees deeper than it had been. I studied the firefly. Neither I nor it made a move for a very long time. The wind continued sweeping past the two of us while the numberless leaves of the zelkova tree rustled in the darkness. I waited forever.
~
"How do you like communal living?" she asked. "Is it fun to live with a lot of other people?"
"I don't know, I've only been doing it a month or so. It's not that bad, I can stand it."
She seemed to be turning something over in her mind. Then she looked straight into my eyes as if peering at some unusual object. Now I saw that her eyes were so deep and clear they made my heart thump. I realized that I had never had occasion to look into her eyes like this.
----
Now, about you. I think you take everything too seriously. Loving another person is a wonderful thing, and if that love is sincere, no one ends up tossed into a labyrinth. You have to have more faith in yourself. My advice to you is very simple. First of all, if you are drawn so strongly to this Midori person, it is only natural for you to have fallen in love with her. It might go well, or it might not. But love is like that. When you fall in love, the natural thing to do is give yourself to it. That's what I think. It's just a form of sincerity.
----
Brickmason.credits:
released December 20, 2024
Released on cassette by Underwater Computing:
underwater-computing.bandcamp.com/album/night-skies-again

Brickmason.title: ÆON Mall Ky​ō​to​-​Gojō
Brickmason.about:
Hello, and welcome to ÆON Mall Kyoto-Gojō! It's a rainy day, but we’re happy you left your cozy home to do some shopping!!
Our facilities blend the traditional and the modern. Whether you’re here to shop, dine, or immerse yourself in Kyoto’s cultural treasures, you'll find the perfect spot to relax and unwind.
With so much to explore, ÆON Mall Kyoto-Gojō is the perfect destination for a fun-filled shopping experience. Enjoy your visit, and don't forget your umbrella!
///
This mallsoft album samples Majestic 12's works and features field recordings of malls made in 2024 at the Maine Mall in Portland, Maine and at the Montreal Eaton Centre in Montreal, Canada on a TASCAM DR-05X.

Brickmason.title: Pok​é​Dreams: Blue Version
Brickmason.about:
Pokémon: Blue Version was released in North America in 1998. I was 8 years old. In my earliest memories playing it, it’s summer in my grandmother’s basement, I’m under blanket forts, I’m wrapped in my hand-woven purple blanket, and I’m sharing a super size fry with my grandmother (before they got rid of them). I played. I napped. I would wake, and I would play. I would train, I would explore, and I would nap. The music lives in my heart. In PokéDreams: Blue Version, Red Version, and Yellow Version, I wanted to recreate those earliest feelings of excitement, of exploration, and of peace.
Blue was created with more slumbery (and perhaps spooky, more night-time) tones including the lavender, pokémon tower, and jigglypuff tracks. Pallet town is by far my favorite song of any in the series and, fittingly, it was the first I ever created.
Red was created with some intentionally brighter and cheery moods; both cinnabar island as well as evolution, for example, feel like tending to a gently-lit fire at sunset. If Blue Version is walking through a sleepy, gentle forest, then Red Version is watching the sun rise from your blanket fort, not quite awake, looking forward to a fresh new day.
Yellow was created with an intent to explore. In terms of song choice, I prioritized unused tracks found by the fan community through data mining and ROM analysis, like the alternate (unused) ending track, field route, and the unused victory theme (titled “勝利 victory! on the album). I also included the Yellow Version tracks - pikachu’s beach and the Yellow Version title screen theme - which I wasn’t familiar with, since my best friend had this version and I didn’t. This album is fresh to my ears with songs that are less familiar to me, yet they feel exciting and fun - like the beach!
Thanks to silphwave for being such an important part of this project - and thank you, listener, for coming along on this journey with me.
August '23
-Brick 🧱

IN ??/??/??, TWO MEDITATION INITIATION TAPES WERE RETRIEVED AT AREA 1243, FORMERLY KNOWN AS "NORDWRONG RAINFOREST HILL"
NORDWRONG INDUSTRIES ANALYZED BOTH TAPES. RECOVERED TRACES OF ITS FIRST ANALYSIS INDICATED THAT THE SECOND OF THE TWO TAPES FEATURED GENERATIVE AND UNKNOWN MOTIFS. IT WAS RECOMMENDED TO NOT USE THE TAPE WITHOUT MEDICAL PRECAUTION.
TODAY, A SIGN HANGS AT NORDWRONG INDUSTRIES STATING "ANY TRESPASSERS ON AREA 1243 WILL NOW BE -------------."
IN ??/??/??, A THIRD TAPE WAS SECRETLY RETRIEVED AT AREA 1243, AND ITS CONTENTS ANALYZED. IT WAS DETERMINED TO BE A CHILD OF THE OTHER TWO TAPES, BORN IN THEIR MEMORY.

trackinfo.title: Volkswägen Shopping: Sunflöwer Yellow
trackinfo.about:
Evangelion Unit-00 (エヴァンゲリオン 零号機[?], "Zerogōki") ist die erste funktionsfähige Evangelion-Einheit, die als Prototyp für den Rest der Evangelion-Serie dient. Es wird von Rei Ayanami gesteuert.
Unit-00 ist der Prototyp, die erste erfolgreiche Evangelion, und wird vom First Child, Rei Ayanami, gesteuert. Das Kopfdesign ähnelt dem der vorherigen gescheiterten Versuche, jedoch mit nur einer Kamera. Auf der Oberseite des Kopfes befinden sich zwei Kuppeln, eine weiße und eine transparente grüne; ihre Funktion (falls vorhanden) wird nie offenbart. Einheit-00 ist die einzige der ursprünglichen Evangelions, die nie ohne ihre Rüstung gesehen wird (Einheit-02 wurde in The End of Evangelion und Einheit-01 bei mehreren Gelegenheiten enthüllt) oder ihren Mund öffnet; daher ist das Aussehen seines organischen Körpers unbekannt.
Unit-00 war ursprünglich wie die vorherigen Prototypen orange gefärbt, aber seine Panzerung wurde durch den Partikelstrahl des Engels Ramiel irreparabel beschädigt. Die anschließenden Reparaturen und Upgrades umfassten neben anderen Änderungen, die vorgenommen wurden, um sie für Kampfbedingungen besser geeignet zu machen, eine blaue Panzerung. Es wurde später als Evangelion Unit-00 '(エヴァンゲリオン零号機(改)[?], "Evangerion Zerogōki Kai") bezeichnet.
Cover art by: TVVIN_PINEZ_M4LL & Brickmason
tvvinpinezm4ll.bandcamp.com
Volkswägen Shopping: Sunflöwer Yellow originally released by B O G U S // COLLECTIVE on August 15, 2022
boguscollective.bandcamp.com/album/volksw-gen-shopping-sunfl-wer-yellow
trackinfo.credits: from Volkswägen Shopping, released August 15, 2022

trackinfo.title: Volksw​​​ä​​​gen Shopping: Poppy Red
trackinfo.about:
Evangelion Unit-02 (エヴァンゲリオン弐号機[?], „Evangerion Nigōki“) ist die dritte fertiggestellte Evangelion, die erste Produktionsmodell-Evangelion. Das Design von Unit-02 korrigiert angeblich die Fehler, die während des Baus von Prototype Unit-00 und Test Type Unit-01 gemacht wurden, und macht es zum ersten Evangelion, das speziell für den Kampf gegen die Engel gebaut wurde. Es wird von Asuka Langley Sohryu und kurz von Kaworu Nagisa gesteuert.
Unit-02 ist ein Produktionsmodell Evangelion und verwendet die gleiche Panzerungsanordnung wie die nachfolgenden Unit-03 und Unit-04, zusammen mit der verbesserten Unit-00'. Alle Evangelion, die diese Anordnung verwenden, haben das gleiche Schulterpylon-Design und fünf V-förmige Panzerplatten auf ihrem Torso.
Dieses Evangelion ist einzigartig, da es bläulich-violettes Blut, blaugraue Haut und vier Augen hat. (Alle anderen Evangelion besitzen rotes Blut, und für alle Nicht-Massenproduktions-Evangelion, einschließlich Unit-00, sind zwei Augen und braune Haut der Standard.) Die Augen haben eine einheitliche feurige Orangefarbe.
Cover art by: TVVIN_PINEZ_M4LL & Brickmason
tvvinpinezm4ll.bandcamp.com
Volksw​​​ä​​​gen Shopping: Poppy Red originally released by B O G U S // COLLECTIVE on January 30, 2023
boguscollective.bandcamp.com/album/volksw-gen-shopping-poppy-red
trackinfo.credits: from Volkswägen Shopping, released August 15, 2022

trackinfo.title: Volksw​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ä​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​gen Shopping: L​​​ä​​​vender P​​​ü​​​rple
trackinfo.about:
Evangelion Unit-03 (エヴァンゲリオン 3号機, Evangerion Sangōki?) ist eine Evangelion-Einheit, die nie in Aktion tritt, bevor sie in Episode 17 von Neon Genesis Evangelion von Bardiel besessen wird. Es wurde von Tōji Suzuhara gesteuert.
Die Evangelion Unit-03 wurde von der NERV Second Branch in Massachusetts, USA, gebaut und ist eine von zwei Einheiten, die nach dem Second Production Model-Design gebaut wurden. Es ist die Brudereinheit von Einheit-04 (Einheit-03 und Einheit-04 waren seltsamerweise die einzigen Evangelionen, die während der Serie als Männer angesprochen wurden). Die Regierung der Vereinigten Staaten bestand darauf, die Rechte zum Bau der Blöcke 03 und 04 zu besitzen.
Zwischen dem ersten und dem zweiten Serienmodell wurden einige geringfügige Änderungen vorgenommen. Die Farbe von Unit-03 war einzigartig, mit viel dunkleren Platten als bei jedem anderen Evangelion. Auch der Kopf hatte eine seltsame Form mit einer abgerundeten Oberseite und einem übertriebenen Kinn. Unit-03 weist ein überwiegend schwarzes Farbschema mit weißen und roten Akzenten auf. Es hat graue Augen, wie das Standbild seiner Zerstörung beweist. Als es jedoch zum ersten Mal aktiviert wurde, waren in den Augen des Evangelion rote Adern zu sehen, die auf die Infektion des Engels hindeuteten.
Der ihm zugewiesene Pilot war Tōji Suzuhara, aber auf dem Weg nach Japan wurde es vom dreizehnten Engel, Bardiel, besessen, der als Wolke erschien. Als Bardiel kämpfte es kurzzeitig gegen Einheit 01, wurde jedoch letztendlich zerstört und auseinandergerissen, nachdem die Steuerung von Einheit 01 von Shinji auf das Dummy-Plug-System umgestellt wurde, das Rei Ayanami als Pilot simulieren sollte. Toji, der Pilot, wird schwer verletzt, überlebt aber letztendlich.
Cover art by: TVVIN_PINEZ_M4LL & Brickmason
